name: Night of the Dead 2
blurb: A free to play cooperative survival game available on the Starcraft II Arcade (no Starcraft II purchase necessary).

rewards.reward: No Reward
PRIVATE: Credited\r\n==============================\r\nYour name in the credits and the satisfaction of making NOTD II the best it can be.

PRIVATE FIRST CLASS: Credited + Personalized Sidearm + Custom Color
==============================
Personalized Sidearm: A sidearm of your choice (Pistol, Combat Knife, Tomahawk, Magnum Revolver, ect), named to your specifications.
______________________________
Custom Color: A custom player identification color, mixed by you.

CORPORAL: Credited +
Personalized Sidearm + Custom Color + Backer Weapon Skins + Backer Pet + Backer Portrait Border
==============================
Backer Weapon Skins: Bling out your guns with gold plating.
______________________________
Backer Pet: Rise again after death and punch zombies in the face with the Undead Marine pet.
______________________________
Backer Portrait Border: Make your character stand out on the Team UI with this gold faceplate.

SERGEANT: Credited +
Personalized Sidearm + Custom Color + Backer Weapon Skins + Backer Pet + Backer Portrait Border + Backer Follower + Backer Rank Set + Backer Armor Set
==============================
Backer Follower: The iPistol Marine animatronic will follow you wherever you go, enthusiastically dancing all the way.
______________________________
Backer Rank Set: Replace your normal rank set with an extra fancy UGC Dress Uniform rank set.
______________________________
Backer Armor Set: The Golden Centurion armor set is normally reserved for ceremonies and the like, but it serves equally well as combat ready armor.

CIVILIAN CONTRACTOR: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + NPC Naming
==============================
Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits.
______________________________ 
NPC Naming: Name a minor NPC, your choice between a colonist or a scientist.

COMMISSIONED OFFICER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Class Naming
==============================
Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits.
______________________________ 
Class Naming: Put your name in the rotation for class character names. Optional: Have your name apply to your character whenever you choose that class.

HEAVY ARMOR: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Mercenary Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Mercenary Naming: Name the the mercenary leader and the company that primarily utilizes heavy body armor and shock troop tactics.

TANK COMMANDER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Mercenary Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Mercenary Naming: Name the mercenary leader and the company that airdrops in a battle tank to aid them in their goals.

ARTILLERY SUPPORT: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Mercenary Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Mercenary Naming: Name the mercenary leader and the company that calls in devastating artillery strikes to destroy their enemies.

AIR SUPPORT: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Mercenary Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Mercenary Naming: Name the mercenary leader and company that is supported by low-altitude gunships.

ELITE INFANTRY: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Mercenary Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Mercenary Naming: Name the mercenary leader and company that uses advanced tactics such as flares and smoke grenades to overcome obstacles.

CHEM DOGS: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Mercenary Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Mercenary Naming: Name the mercenary leader and company that uses dangerous chemical weapons to destroy everything in their path.

PEACEKEEPER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Chief Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Chief Naming: Name a major NPC, the Peacekeeper Chief, leader of Eden's police and militia.

MINING MASTER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Foreman Naming ============================== Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits. ______________________________ Foreman Naming: Name a major NPC, the Mining Foreman, the head of all mining operations on Eden.

COMMANDING OFFICER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + CO Naming
==============================
Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits.
______________________________ 
CO Naming: Name a major NPC, UGC Commanding Officer that gives the players instructions throughout the main campaign.

HEAD SCIENTIST: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Scientist Naming
==============================
Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits.
______________________________ 
Scientist Naming: Name a major NPC, the UGC Head Scientist that oversees all of the research and development on Eden.

REBEL LEADER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Rebel Naming
==============================
Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits.
______________________________ 
Rebel Naming: Name a major NPC, the leader of the colonist's rebellion.

SHADOWY MASTER: Sergeant Tier + Special Thanks + Black Ops Naming
==============================
Special Thanks: Your name and a short message will be placed in the Special Thanks during the credits.
______________________________ 
Black Ops Naming: Name a major NPC, the head of the mysterious Black Ops organization.

MANSLAYER: Sergeant Tier + Ultra Special Thanks + Hero Killer
==============================
Ultra Special Thanks: You will be credited as a majority contributor to the game with your name placed in the Ultra Special Thanks portion of the credits, along with a message of any reasonable length.
______________________________ 
Hero Killer: Become the final boss of the first storyline, a colonist who becomes an enormous monster who threatens to destroy Eden.

PROGENATOR: Sergeant Tier + Ultra Special Thanks + Hero Builder
==============================
Ultra Special Thanks: You will be credited as a majority contributor to the game with your name placed in the Ultra Special Thanks portion of the credits, along with a message of any reasonable length.
______________________________ 
Hero Builder: Design a class to be implemented in NOTD II. We'll work with you to make sure your vision is implemented as well as it can be.
